remarks: The predicate "is a division ring".  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)
statement:
isdivrng1.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
isdivrng1.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
isdivrng1.3 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
isdivrng1.4 $e |- X = ran G $.
isdrngo1 $p |- ( R e. DivRingOps <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ ( H |` ( ( X \ { Z } ) X. ( X \ { Z } ) ) ) e. GrpOp ) ) $.
